csnake Changelog
================

0.2.0 (2018-10-08)
-----------------

Features added
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

* Complete rewrite of the original C-Snake


0.2.1 (2018-10-08)
-----------------

Features added
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

* Tested the CI pipeline for automatic PyPI upload


0.2.2 (2018-10-08)
-----------------

Bug fixes
~~~~~~~~~

* Fixed erroneous documentation and PyPI info
